personalInfo.clubAffl: Crossfield Collicut Siding GC (Airdrie, Alberta, Canada)

tourBios.carHigh:
2015: T15 at the Tour's second tournament of the season, the Bayview Place Island Savings Open. Followed it up with a T4 finish at the Syncrude Boreal Open.

2014: Earned conditional status at the British Columbia Qualifying School...Posted rounds of 65-66 on the weekend to T7 at the SIGA Dakota Dunes Open, his first career top-10 finish in fifth PGA TOUR Canada start.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won 2013 Alberta Open and the 2013 Alberta Amateur Championship...Captured the 2012 British Columbia Amateur Championship.
tourBios.personal: Played one season at the University of Texas-Arlington...Is an avid fisherman and considers setting the hook on a bass to be his biggest thrill outside golf...Also calls tacklewarehouse.com his favorite website. Includes "River Monsters" and "Family Guy" as his top TV shows...Favorite course is the Redwood Meadows G&CC...Favorite professional team is the New England Patriots

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T4th in 2015 at the The Syncrude Boreal Open Presented by AECON.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 35th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
